A better way to msc20 tokens: A better way to msc20 tokens
Check out msc-20 balance of the address: Check out msc-20 balance of the address.
Token List Desc: Recognize all operations including DEPLOY, MINT and TRANSFER.
Need Your Location Contnet: To create your GeoInscription, we require your location details. This information will be linked with an MXC Hexagon ID in the inscription. A Hexagon represents a digital area with a 2 km radius. Your location data is used exclusively for this purpose, no personal data is stored on-chain and this data contains no (UIF) user identifiable factors.
Indexing successful Dsc: DePINscription has triumphantly finalized the indexing process. You’re all set now—let’s forge ahead and LFG!
Indexing Progress Dsc: DePINscription is diligently processing your inscription and orders. Please hold for a moment during this crucial phase, as we strive together in the pursuit of our national pride!
The current tick has been deployed: The current tick {{tick}} has been deployed
Global Standard Help: Represents countries and regions based on the International Standard Organization's ISO 3166-2.
Inclusivity Help: Includes all areas, even disputed territories, without political endorsement.
Purpose Help: Serves as a universal identifier for GeoInscriptions in international contexts.
Coming soon stay tuned Help: The DePINscription marketplace is set to feature a curated weekly roundup of the most sought-after geolocation inscriptions. Our selection process is comprehensive, taking into account a variety of factors such as the advancement of minting activities, the vibrancy of user engagement across different countries and regions, the level of interaction with the MXC L3 zkEVM, as well as the inscription's visibility and reach on Twitter, among other metrics. This ensures that our listings reflect the inscriptions that are not only popular but also dynamically involved in the DePIN space.
root_step_2: Click Token to check the Inscription lists that can be deployed.
root_step_3: It is your wallet which shows your inscription holdings and amounts, you can list and transfer them there.
root_step_4: Trade them on the DePINscription marketplace
token_page_step_1: Click details of each code to participate in the minting process.
token_page_step_2: If you don’t find your favorite DePINscription, you should click deploy yourself.
token_page_step_3: Click the Ticker to choose the code for your country/region to deploy, currently you can only deploy once per code.
token_page_step_4: Put the limit per mint and total supply there, it can’t be changed, be careful about the amounts.
token_page_step_5: Click Deploy to finish the new DePINscription deployement process.
tokens_detail_page_step_1: Click Mint to participate the minting process of your DePINscription
personal_page_step_1: You can transfer your Inscription to other addresses.
personal_page_step_2: List your DePINscription on the marketplace, please note that if your inscription is not yet listed on the marketplace it won’t be indexed, you will be able to delist it once it can be traded.
personal_page_step_3: Click inscriptions to view your recent DePINscription data.
token_page_step_0_5: Check all the minting progress of the DePINscriptions
